Package org.raistlic.common.codec

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Codec<S,D>
    A codec is a combination of encoder and decoder, that is, it can translate between two types in both ways.
    Decoder<S,T>
    This instance defines the parser that parses the referenced type D to the referenced type S.
    Deserializer<E>
    Decoder that decodes value of type <E> from a String .
    Encoder<S,D>
    This instance defines the parser that parses the referenced type S to the referenced type D.
    Serializer<E>
    Encoder that encodes a value of type <E> into a String .
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodecAdapter<S,D>
    This class simply combines a proper encoder and a proper decoder together, to adapt the Codec interface.
    DecoderCodecAdapter<S,D>
    This class wraps a decoder to do the decode job, and leaves the encode job to its sub class implementation.
    Deserializers
    A collection of static factory methods that export commonly used Deserializer instances.
    EncoderCodecAdapter<S,D>
    This class wraps an encoder to do the encode job, and leaves the decode job to its sub class implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ValueConversionException
    This class defines an unchecked exception, to be thrown when unexpected error occurs during the process of encoding or decoding.
